title: Can't click anything in game
body:
Hi

This just started happening to me today, no idea why, I played yesterday no problem.

I am on Windows 10, on creator's update.

Now when I get into a game I can't click/move my character or level any abilities or buy from store or anything.  Typing worked, intermittently.

I restarted the game, my computer and the game, and then even reinstalled LOL to no avail.

Any ideas?  Thanks.  As of now league is unplayable.

replies.body: I have the same problem does anyone else see their normal cursor while this is happening

Exact same thing is happening to me. I've done a clean install of LoL, updated all drivers on my computer, tried resetting the input setting through persistentsettings.json. Nothing is working. Game is unplayable. Been this way for 2 days now.

something similar has happen to me, once in the game all of a sudden i cant click and after a while im able to click again, happens serval times during the game  even do im not lagging and every one else in the game seams to be okay, only seems to happen with the league app, every thing else on my CPU works just fine
I have the same issue running Windows 7. I have the public server client and it started happening since the new update.
